content.header2: The Go Campaign is our opportunity to engage people who have never meaningfully encountered the good news of Jesus, in new and innovative ways.
content.text2: A pledge is a non-binding promise about how you anticipate supporting the Go Campaign over the next 2.5 years. A pledge will allow you to plan ahead for your giving, allowing you to make conscious choices about spending your money in ways that reflect your faith and values.
content.text3: Receiving your pledge allows us to budget wisely for the use of funds received. Thank you.
